en: Where was it? I've forgotten it.
Tanaka has been arrested on suspicion of murder.
zh: 田中因涉嫌谋杀被捕了。

en: If you don't eat fast, you will be late for school.
zh: 你不快点吃的话，上学就要迟到了。

en: If you don't eat fast, you'll be late for school.
zh: 你要是不快点吃，上学就该迟到了。

en: Tom locked his sister in the closet.
zh: 汤姆把他妹妹锁进壁橱里了。

en: Is there something that you want to tell me?
zh: 你是不是有什么话想跟我说？
她真是个无所事事的懒鬼。

en: I just want to say how thankful I am for all your help.
zh: 我只是想说，真的很感谢你帮了我这么多。

en: If you want me to wear those boots, I'll wear those boots.
zh: 你要是想让我穿那双靴子，我就穿。

en: I want to live in Boston.
I don't want to waste your time.

zh: 汤姆那会儿看起来挺开心的。

en: I would be happy to do so.
I'm glad I make you happy.
I'm happy to be here, Tom.
I'm so happy for you both.
zh: 我真为你们两个感到高兴。

en: I'm so happy for you guys.
I'm so happy for you, Tom.
zh: 汤姆，我真为你感到高兴。

en: I'm so happy you like Tom.
I'm happy to hear you say that.
Tom is definitely not happy to be there.
zh: 汤姆在那儿绝对不开心。

en: Tom tried to pick his keys up with his toes.
zh: 汤姆试着用脚趾头把钥匙捡起来。
玛丽有一头漂亮的长发。
玛丽有一双漂亮的棕色眼睛。

en: Tom got jealous when he saw Mary talking to a handsome guy.
zh: 汤姆看见玛丽在跟一个帅哥说话，就吃醋了。

en: Tom is rather busy at the moment.
It looks like you've been busy today.
Tom is busy making breakfast for the family.
zh: 汤姆正忙着给全家做早饭呢。

en: Medical innovations are the best way to relieve us from sufferings.
zh: 医疗创新是减轻我们痛苦的最好方式。
汤姆小心地打开了盒子。

en: Just be careful not to push Tom too hard.
zh: 只要小心别把汤姆逼得太紧就行。

en: There were three hundred cardboard boxes filled with old clothes ready to be sent to the disaster area.
zh: 有三百个装满旧衣服的纸箱准备发往灾区。

en: I know that I'm in trouble now.
zh: 我知道我现在有麻烦了。

en: Tom used to bake cookies for us.
zh: 汤姆以前常给我们烤饼干。

en: Why don't you go play outside?
How long have you been playing the violin?
zh: 你拉小提琴拉了多久了？

en: The big fish eat the small ones.
I recently met an old friend.
I sensed immediately that something was wrong.
I would like to be alone.
Tom should've discussed it with his parents.
zh: 汤姆本该跟他父母商量的。

en: I don't think that Tom is selfish.
The exam was two and a half hours long.
On the main menu of this DVD there is no 'Play Main Feature' button.
zh: 这张DVD的主菜单上没有“播放正片”按钮。

en: I learned a lot from Tom.
zh: 我从汤姆那儿学到了很多。

en: Where did you buy the flowers?
zh: 那些花你是在哪儿买的？

en: I've always wanted to learn how to skate.
I borrowed three books from the library.
zh: 我从图书馆借了三本书。

en: I'm so tired that I can barely move.
I've got something in my eye.
After talking to Tom for a few minutes, it became obvious that his French wasn't very good, so Mary switched to English.
zh: 跟汤姆聊了几分钟后，很明显他的法语水平不怎么样，所以玛丽换成了英语。

en: Do you want to give it a try?

zh: 我不敢相信汤姆已经死了。

en: Tom's planning something special for Mary's birthday.
zh: 汤姆在为玛丽的生日准备惊喜。
汤姆看到了些不寻常的东西。
汤姆是不是又弄坏什么东西了？
正在发生一些奇怪的事情。

en: This is something I have to do.
Did I miss something this morning?
zh: 今天早上我错过什么了吗？

en: I don't need gold, I only seek the ultimate truth.
zh: 我不需要黄金，我只追求终极真理。

en: A lot of people attended Tom's funeral.
zh: 很多人参加了汤姆的葬礼。

en: Tom sat down on the sofa.
zh: 汤姆在沙发上坐了下来。

en: I thought that you'd agree with me.
If I had all the time in the world, I'd build a boat and sail to Fiji.
zh: 如果我有足够的时间，我会造一艘船，然后航行到斐济。

en: Some things are better not said.
And he saith unto them, Why are ye fearful, O ye of little faith? Then he arose, and rebuked the winds and the sea; and there was a great calm.
zh: 耶稣对他们说：“你们这些小信的人哪，为什么胆怯呢？”于是起来，斥责风和海，风和海就大大地平静了。

en: "I'll do it tomorrow." "You said that yesterday!"
zh: “我明天再做。”“你昨天也是这么说的！”

en: I need a keyboard to be funny.
You should have kept your mouth shut.
I should have kept my mouth shut.
My uncle gave me this watch.
zh: 这块表是我叔叔送我的。

en: I went swimming in the river.
After taking a shower, Tom ate dinner.
zh: 汤姆洗完澡后吃了晚饭。

en: She has remained in her present position for ten years.
zh: 她在现在的职位上已经干了十年了。

en: Let's not talk about it anymore.
His car is two years old.
I thought that you were from Boston.
zh: 我还以为你是波士顿来的呢。

en: The star system Alpha Centauri has a planet called Alpha Centauri Bb.
zh: 半人马座阿尔法星系里有一颗行星叫半人马座阿尔法Bb。

en: I want to be a teacher.
Tom looked around, but saw no one.
zh: 汤姆环顾四周，但谁也没看见。

en: Tom looked around, but didn't see anyone.
zh: 汤姆环顾四周，但没看到任何人。

en: The bus stopped, but no one got out.
zh: 公交车停了，但没人下车。

en: I appreciate what you did yesterday.
zh: 我很感激你昨天做的事。

en: Do you know anybody in Boston?
zh: 你在波士顿有认识的人吗？

en: I know him better than anybody.

zh: 这事儿谁都有可能遇到。

en: Go away, I want to be alone!
I don't think he is right.

zh: 大家都朝汤姆冲了过去。
汤姆不喜欢下国际象棋。

en: I like that dress a lot.

zh: 我真的很喜欢那件裙子。

en: Tell Tom that I said hi.

zh: 汤姆以前对玛丽很着迷。

en: It all started with a well-intentioned experiment.
zh: 这一切都始于一个出于好意的实验。

en: Tom said that he'd call at 2:30.
zh: 汤姆说他两点半会打电话。

en: I thought that you'd gone to Boston.
zh: 我以为你已经去波士顿了。

en: Never write the words "bortsch" and "shchi" in German!
zh: 千万不要用德语写“bortsch”和“shchi”这两个词！

en: Luck is a part of life.

zh: 汤姆给玛丽写了一封信。

en: I'm looking for my passport. Have you seen it?
zh: 我在找我的护照。你看见了吗？

en: What time is it over there?
If you have the time you are welcome to make use of and contribute to the Tatoeba project.
zh: 如果你有时间，欢迎使用并为 Tatoeba 项目做贡献。

en: I took it as a joke and did not answer.
zh: 我把它当成了玩笑，所以没回答。

en: What do you think was the most read article this year on the Japanese version of Wikipedia?
zh: 你觉得今年日语版维基百科上阅读量最高的文章是什么？

en: I thought that a game of tennis might be fun.
zh: 我觉得打场网球应该挺好玩的。

en: I have more experience than Tom.
I thought that you said you used to live in Boston.
zh: 我以为你说你以前住在波士顿。

en: I thought that you said that you used to live in Boston.
zh: 我以为你说过你以前住在波士顿。

en: I thought you said that you used to live in Boston.
zh: 我还以为你说你以前住在波士顿呢。

en: I thought that you might want to look over these documents.
zh: 我觉得你可能想过目一下这些文件。

en: I wish I could have eaten at that restaurant with you.
zh: 我真希望当时能和你一起在那家餐厅吃饭。

en: I lost my adorable kitten a few weeks back.
zh: 几周前，我弄丢了我那只可爱的小猫。

en: He that will steal an egg will steal an ox.
The cutting machine sliced the salmon.
zh: 切割机把三文鱼切开了。
只要你努力，就会成功的。

en: I'm still angry because of her.
I plan to give my son a computer at the end of the month.
zh: 我打算月底给儿子买台电脑。

en: If one has the right to live, then one should also have the right to die. If not, then living is not a right, but an obligation.
zh: 如果人有生存的权利，那也应该有死亡的权利。否则，生存就不是权利，而是义务。
我在两个选项中做了选择。

en: The church is in the middle of the village.
I ended up seeing it under bad circumstances.
zh: 我最后还是在不太合适的情况下看到了它。

en: The play is based on true events.
zh: 这部剧是根据真实事件改编的。

en: The queue for the toilet has got too long. Do you think it's time we expedited things by having a peek?
zh: 厕所排队的人太多了，你觉得我们要不要过去瞧瞧是怎么回事，好快一点？

en: With the toilet queue getting too long, do you think we'll make it back in time for the curtain?
zh: 厕所排这么长的队，你觉得咱们能赶在开演前回来吗？

en: My level of Japanese is weak, so I can't write well.
zh: 我的日语水平有限，写不太好。

en: The Chinese government took measures to slow the rise of the price of houses.
zh: 中国政府采取了措施来抑制房价上涨。

en: They held themselves in high regard.
zh: 他们觉得自己挺了不起的。

en: I became embarrassed about the matter.
zh: 我对这事儿感到挺尴尬的。

en: Tom had never been to Boston.
zh: 汤姆从来没去过波士顿。

en: If anything happens, call me right away.
zh: 万一有什么事，马上给我打电话。

en: That tired boy is sound asleep.
zh: 那个累坏了的小男孩睡得很香。

en: The sales floor was relatively uncrowded.
Soccer is a sport in which players can't touch the ball with their arms, except for the keeper, who can use his whole body to defend the goal.
zh: 足球是一项除了守门员可以用全身防守球门外，其他球员都不能用手臂碰球的运动。

en: There's really nothing much at all that you see as being beneath you.
zh: 你还真是什么事儿都拉得下脸去做。

en: Where's the gate for Japan Airlines flight 124?
zh: 日本航空124次航班的登机口在哪儿？

en: He that thinks little, errs much.
zh: 欠考虑的人最容易犯错。

en: The first was not the best.
Are you in a bad mood?
I spoke to Tom last night.
I thought that I recognized Tom.
zh: 我还以为我认出汤姆来了。

en: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies; Thou hast anointed my head with oil; my cup runneth over.
zh: 在我敌人面前，你为我摆设筵席；你用油膏了我的头，使我的福杯满溢。

en: I've just gone and lost my key somewhere around here.
zh: 我刚把钥匙弄丢在这一带了。
咱们干脆一不做二不休。

en: I thought that I'd never be happy again.
zh: 我还以为我再也不会开心了呢。

en: I thought that this might come in handy.
zh: 我觉得这东西没准儿能派上用场。

en: "I will talk with Mary as soon as possible.", Tom thought to himself.
zh: 汤姆心想：“我会尽快跟玛丽谈谈的。”

en: In case of an emergency, what number should I call?
zh: 万一有急事，我该打哪个号码？

en: Since I speak the truth, I live soundly at home.
zh: 既然我说的是实话，我在家里也住得踏实。

en: Adding manpower to a late software project makes it later.
zh: 给进度落后的软件项目增加人手只会让它更慢。

en: It is OK for me to use that?
Is it OK if I use that?
When you have allergies, eating at a restaurant is a huge pain.
zh: 有过敏症的话，去餐厅吃饭真的很麻烦。

en: When you have food allergies, eating out is difficult, isn't it?
zh: 有食物过敏的话，出去吃挺不容易的，对吧？

en: In America, cars drive on the right side of the road.
zh: 在美国，车是靠右行驶的。

en: For the love of money is the root of all evil: which while some coveted after, they have erred from the faith, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows.
zh: 贪财是万恶之源：有人因为贪恋钱财而背离了信仰，让自己陷入了重重痛苦之中。

en: Someone stole my car. It's not there where I parked it.
zh: 有人偷了我的车。我停车的地方车没了。

en: I wonder what it would be like to feel refined and elegant like him.
zh: 我在想，如果能像他那样举止优雅会是什么感觉。

en: Do you really want to move to Boston again?
zh: 你真的想再次搬到波士顿吗？

en: Do you really want to move back to Boston?
zh: 你真的想搬回波士顿吗？

en: Do you accept a credit card?
zh: 你们这儿可以刷信用卡吗？

en: If you'd stuck around, you would've had a lot of fun.
zh: 如果你当时留下来，肯定会玩得很开心的。
你最喜欢的电影是什么？

en: How much time do adults spend watching television every day?
zh: 成年人每天花多少时间看电视？

en: He is especially frightened of dogs.
Get out of here, all of you!
If you want to grow up, you have to drink a lot of milk.
zh: 如果你想快快长大，就得喝很多牛奶。

en: Could you push the door open?
He's a cold person like that.

zh: 真是各种各样的人都有。

en: I thought that I saw something.
zh: 我还以为我看到什么了呢。

en: I thought that I smelled bacon.
zh: 我还以为我闻到培根味了。

en: The door hinge's creaking is annoying!
zh: 门轴嘎吱嘎吱响，真烦人！

en: Who is being exchanged with whom?
I don't like dirty jokes, but I get a kick out of it when you tell them.
zh: 我不喜欢荤段子，但你讲我就觉得挺逗的。

en: Have you been crying all night? Your eyes are all puffy.
zh: 你是哭了一晚上吗？眼睛都肿了。

en: About how much money do you need?
I don't think this is interesting.
zh: 我觉得这个没什么意思。

en: I don't think that this is interesting.
I'm sorry that I got you in trouble.
You should watch that movie sometime; it's very interesting.
zh: 你该找时间看看那部电影，挺有意思的。

en: She is looking at our fruit.
That person is looking at our fruit.
zh: 那个人在看我们的水果。

en: I'm not in that much of a hurry.
Read this sentence three times, and while you are sleeping, a ghost will manifest.
zh: 这句话读三遍，你睡觉的时候鬼就会出来。

en: The French and the English like drinking, but the latter prefer beer whereas the former go in for red wine.
zh: 法国人和英国人都爱喝酒，不过英国人更爱喝啤酒，而法国人更喜欢红酒。

en: Out of those three people, Mike is the biggest.
zh: 那三个人里，迈克块头最大。

en: Christmas comes but once a year.
Why don't you take off your coat?
Aren't you going to take your coat off?
zh: 你不打算把外套脱了吗？

en: My elder brother plays the guitar very well.
The whale was found off the coast of Wakayama.
zh: 在和歌山县岸边发现了一头鲸鱼。

en: More women than men commit perjury.
zh: 女性作伪证的比男性多。

en: Do you still love your wife?
This is one of the dictionaries I told you about yesterday.
zh: 这就是我昨天跟你说的其中一本词典。

en: Tom gave Mary his telephone number.
zh: 汤姆把他的电话号码给了玛丽。

en: You are such a nice person! You are so kind to me! Thank you.
zh: 你人真好！对我这么好，谢谢你。

en: If you have a time, could you translate some sentences below, please?
zh: 如果你有空，能帮我翻译下面几句话吗？

en: I don't play tennis after school.
He forgot to feed the dog.
This river is two hundred kilometers long.
Why do you drink until you're this drunk?
Why do you drink until you are that drunk?
Could you tell me your name again?
zh: 能再说一下你的名字吗？

en: I think it would be more fun to go together.
zh: 我觉得一起去会更有趣。

en: I thought that Tom would be in Boston by now.
zh: 我以为汤姆现在已经在波士顿了。

en: I would not go so far as to call Finland a paradise.
zh: 我还不至于把芬兰称为天堂。

en: Now that you are in Italy, you must see Naples.
zh: 既然你人在意大利，一定要去看看那不勒斯。

en: His heart sank to his boots.
How are you going to Milan?
He wants me to go with him to Milan by train to visit a friend.
zh: 他想让我跟他一起坐火车去米兰看朋友。

en: I spent a week in Florence last year. I'm sure you'll like it.
zh: 我去年在佛罗伦萨待了一周。我相信你肯定会喜欢的。

en: I'll come back for my suitcases this afternoon.
zh: 我今天下午回来拿我的行李箱。

en: Tom is the only person who could've stolen Mary's necklace.
zh: 只有汤姆才可能偷了玛丽的项链。

en: The book is on the table.
Tom and Mary have two cats.
I caught a big fish yesterday with my bare hands.
zh: 我昨天徒手抓到了一条大鱼。

en: Someone like you can change the world.
zh: 像你这样的人可以改变世界。

en: How far apart are the contractions?
You have a healthy baby boy.
You've given birth to a healthy baby boy.
zh: 你生了一个健康的男孩。

en: They just had a healthy baby boy.
zh: 他们刚生了一个健康的男孩。

en: What time will the train arrive in Yokohama?
Can you explain the exact meaning of this word?
zh: 你能解释一下这个词的确切含义吗？

en: Don't fix it if it ain't broke.
If it's not broken, don't fix it.
Tom showed Mary several pictures of his house.
zh: 汤姆给玛丽看了几张他房子的照片。

en: Tom tried to leave, but Mary stopped him.
zh: 汤姆想走，但玛丽拦住了他。

en: Walking to work in this heat isn't a good idea.
zh: 这么热的天走路上班可不是个好主意。

en: Our father, you see; he's a person who only thinks about work all the time.
zh: 我爸这人，你瞧，整天就知道工作。

en: Lasagna is one of my favorite foods.
zh: 千层面是我最喜欢的食物之一。

en: I'm feeling a little under the weather today.
zh: 我今天身体有点不舒服。

en: The police searched Tom Smith's house.
zh: 警察搜查了汤姆·史密斯的家。

en: Tom Smith's home got searched by the police.
zh: 汤姆·史密斯的家被警察搜查了。
赶紧买齐所有需要的东西。
快点把需要的物品都买了。

en: As for my father, he has not gone abroad until now.
zh: 至于我爸，他到现在还没出过国。

en: "I have the wrong life," was his last words.
The only thing you have to do is shut your mouth.
zh: 你唯一要做的就是闭嘴。

en: I don't like the house he is living in.
zh: 我不喜欢他现在住的那个房子。

en: There are some books that you are looking for that may be found.
zh: 你要找的一些书可能能找到。

en: I have not seen such beautiful flowers.
zh: 我从来没见过这么漂亮的花。

en: Sorry, I can't stay for long.
zh: 不好意思，我不能待太久。

en: The last days of January happened to be cold.
zh: 一月底那几天碰巧很冷。

en: Is there a lot of flowers in this garden?
That ceremony is scheduled to be no longer than 30 minutes.
zh: 那个仪式预计不会超过30分钟。

en: I want to be an astronaut.
I thought Tom was a Canadian.
zh: 我以为汤姆是加拿大人。

en: Why did you go to the city?
I have heard of this song some time ago.
zh: 我前段时间听过这首歌。

en: He is expected to go abroad next year.
I will not speak French with you again.
zh: 我以后再也不会跟你说法语了。

en: There's a dictionary on top of the desk.
A diamond that hasn't been cut does't shine.
zh: 未经打磨的钻石不会发光。

en: I am looking for someone to learn English together.
zh: 我在找一起学英语的人。

en: If you want we can use English.
zh: 如果你想的话，我们可以用英语。

en: It doesn't matter who, just ask somebody.
zh: 不管是准，随便找个人问问就行。

en: I'm happy when I'm with you.
Don't ask me such difficult questions.
The word you use depends on your intended meaning.
zh: 用哪个词得看你想表达什么。

en: He speaks French and of course he speaks English, too.
zh: 他会说法语，当然，英语他也会说。

en: He's too young to live by himself yet.
zh: 他现在还太小，没法一个人住。

en: Did you leave the door open last night?
No matter what you say, I'll do it my way.
zh: 不管你怎么说，我还是要按我的想法来。

en: What time is it there now?
That house is small, but it's big enough for us.
zh: 那房子虽然小，但够我们住了。

en: That's more recent than you think it is.
It's only when I have things I have to do that I find I want to do things I don't have to do.
zh: 只有当我有正事要做的时候，我才发现自己想做那些没必要做的事。

en: "You're really clumsy!" "Get out of my face. I already know that."
zh: “你真笨手笨脚的！”“离我远点，我早就知道了。”

en: I thank you sincerely for having shown me the errors.
zh: 衷心感谢你指出了我的错误。

en: I will properly carry out the things that I said myself.
zh: 我会把我亲口说过的话落到实处的。

en: When was the last time you went to an art gallery?
zh: 你上次去美术馆是什么时候？

en: He will probably never walk again.
zh: 他可能再也站不起来了。

en: So long as men believe that women will forgive anything, they will do anything.
zh: 只要男人觉得女人会原谅一切，他们就什么事都做得出来。

en: I'm going to give you just one more chance.
I'm going to give you one last chance.
I'll give you just one more chance.
zh: 我就再给你一次机会吧。

en: I'll give you one last chance.
zh: 我再给你最后一次机会。

en: It seems that my son is now at a rebellious age and recklessly opposes us.
zh: 我儿子好像到了叛逆期，总是跟我们对着干。

en: You left the computer on, but is that okay?
Why don't you tell me about it?
zh: 你为什么不跟我说说呢？

en: It is delightful to be praised by an expert in the field.
zh: 能被行家夸奖真是太令人高兴了。

en: I wonder why I feel so lonely when it gets cold.
zh: 我在想为什么天一冷我就觉得这么孤独。

en: I still believe the Internet is not a place for children.
zh: 我还是觉得互联网不适合小孩子。

en: Don't make fun of me when I'm talking seriously.
zh: 我说正经的呢，别拿我开涮。

en: My parents don't want me to get married.
Can I have your phone number?
zh: 能给我你的电话号码吗？

en: He often goes to Japan on business.
My wife is obsessed with cleaning.
He has bought a banana case.
zh: 他买了一个香蕉保护盒。

en: She showed absolutely no sign of remorse.
zh: 她一点悔改的意思都没有。

en: There is no rest for the poor.
Shall we go to drink coffee or something?
zh: 咱们去喝杯咖啡什么的？

en: I think I'll email my friends.
zh: 我想给我朋友们发个邮件。

en: I send a letter to my mother.
I'll send my mother a letter.
I'll send a letter to my mother.
Do you mind if I lay down on the sofa?
zh: 你介意我往沙发上躺会儿吗？

en: Do you want to say anything?
Many people believe that acupuncture can cure diseases.
zh: 很多人相信针灸能治病。

en: How much is that wooden chair?
I love her sister very much.
Your pussy stinks when you have sex with me, because you are a dirty slut.
zh: 跟我做爱的时候你下面真臭，你这个肮脏的荡妇。

en: She has an important role in our organization.
zh: 她在我们组织里担任重要角色。

en: Is your child a boy or a girl?
zh: 你家孩子是男孩还是女孩？

en: Tom opened the window to let in some fresh air.
This isn't my responsibility. It's yours.
zh: 这不是我的责任，是你的。

en: She doesn't know what she really wants.
zh: 她不知道自己到底想要什么。
汤姆，你不该一个人待着。

en: I hate being alone this time of year.
zh: 我讨厌在这个时节一个人待着。

en: Tom was sitting alone in the dark waiting for Mary.
zh: 汤姆独自坐在黑暗中等玛丽。

en: From the tower you can look out across the plain spread beneath your eyes.
zh: 从塔上往下看，整片平原尽收眼底。

en: Why don't you come inside and wait?

zh: 要不你给我们指点指点？

en: I wonder why it's always Tom and Mary who show up in Tatoeba sentences.
zh: 我挺纳闷，为什么汤姆和玛丽老是出现在Tatoeba的句子里。

en: I wonder why the names Tom and Mary are often used in sentences that are in the Tatoeba Corpus.
zh: 我想知道为什么Tatoeba语料库里经常用到汤姆和玛丽这两个名字。

en: Today's math class was more interesting than usual.
zh: 今天的数学课比平时有意思。

en: Why don't you take your coat off?
What does he want you to call him?
Did you forget to bring money?
It's not that far from here.
Does this look good on me?
I hear you have a new girlfriend.
Would you please take a picture?
Could you please take a picture?
I slipped on my geta and dashed outside.
zh: 我穿上木屐就冲到了外面。

en: Please put your shoes in the getabako when you take them off.
zh: 脱了鞋后请把鞋放进鞋柜。

en: Please put your shoes in the shoebox when you take them off.
zh: 脱了鞋后请把鞋放进鞋盒。

en: What will I do? The strap on one of my geta has come undone.
zh: 怎么办？我一只木屐的带子松了。

en: What will I do? The strap on one of my geta is broken.
zh: 怎么办？我一只木屐的带子断了。

en: Tokyo is one of the largest cities in the world.
zh: 东京是世界上最大的城市之一。

en: Happiness and sadness only last for a time.
zh: 快乐和悲伤都只是暂时的。

en: What do you want to do tomorrow?
She confessed her love to him.
If dinner isn't ready by seven, I'm going to a restaurant.
zh: 如果七点还没做好饭，我就去餐厅吃。

en: Well, if dinner isn't ready by seven, I'm going to a restaurant.
zh: 那个，如果七点还没做好饭，我就去餐厅吃。

en: Hey, if dinner isn't ready by seven, I'm going to a restaurant.
zh: 嘿，如果七点还没做好饭，我就去餐厅吃。

en: Organic matter is formed by large molecules.
zh: 有机物是由大分子组成的。

en: That ticket is good until April 29th.
How long did you stay in Boston?
How long do you plan to stay in Boston?
zh: 你打算在波士顿待多久？

en: He has little money, but he gets by.
zh: 他钱不多，但还能过日子。

en: He has hardly any money, but he gets by.
zh: 他几乎没钱，但还能过日子。

en: He has almost no money, but he gets by.
zh: 他快没钱了，但还能过日子。

en: Franz Liszt created the concept of the "symphonic poem". This is a composition for orchestra that uses music to describe nonmusical content. This could include, for example, people, legendary figures, landscapes, or paintings.
zh: 弗朗茨·李斯特创造了“交响诗”的概念。这是一种管弦乐作品，用音乐来描述非音乐的内容，例如人物、传奇人物、风景或绘画。

en: The best-known compositions by Franz Liszt are his nineteen Hungarian Rhapsodies, but he also created beautiful sonatas, symphonies, concerti, songs, and religious compositions.
zh: 李斯特最著名的作品是他的十九首《匈牙利狂想曲》，但他也创作了优美的奏鸣曲、交响曲、协奏曲、歌曲和宗教作品。

en: The best-known compositions by Franz Liszt are his nineteen Hungarian Rhapsodies, but he also created beautiful sonatas, symphonies, concerti, Lieder, and religious compositions.
zh: 李斯特最著名的作品是他的十九首《匈牙利狂想曲》，但他也创作了优美的奏鸣曲、交响曲、协奏曲、艺术歌曲和宗教作品。

en: I agreed to take on the job realizing that I had no choice.
zh: 我意识到自己别无选择，只好同意接受这份工作。

en: "Is this really a natural expression?" "Let's ask Mr. Google."
zh: “这表达真的地道吗？”“问问谷歌吧。”

en: The sentence got longer after it was re-written.
zh: 这句话重写之后变长了。

en: Let's go to the flea market tomorrow.
zh: 我们明天去逛跳蚤市场吧。

en: The teacher and I sat down face to face.
zh: 老师和我面对面坐了下来。
别把心里想的大声说出来。

en: Why don't you take a break now?
zh: 你现在干嘛不休息一下？

en: Tom is more experienced in business than me.
zh: 汤姆在生意方面比我有经验。

en: I was tired of the work.
Tom doesn't like being around children because he's always afraid of catching a cold from one of them.
zh: 汤姆不喜欢跟小孩待在一起，因为他总担心被他们传染感冒。

en: In the hands of a wise person, things become really simple. It's a mediocre person, pretending to be wise, that makes an easy thing sound difficult.
zh: 在聪明人手里，事情会变得很简单。只有平庸的人装聪明，才会把简单的事情说得很复杂。

en: Isn't it the case in any language that if you use too many drawn-out words one's expression becomes over-polite.
zh: 难道不是不管什么语言，客套话拖得太长都会显得过于客气吗？

en: I don't get it! Why do I have to take the heat?
zh: 我不明白！凭什么要我背锅？

en: How do I decompress the LZH file?

zh: 我就当这事儿没发生过。
我们就当这事儿没发生过。

en: Because of the heavy fog, we could barely see the road in front of us.
zh: 雾太大了，我们几乎看不清前面的路。

en: The fog was so dense, we could hardly see anything.
After getting out of the shower, Tom wiped the fog off the mirror and shaved.
zh: 洗完澡后，汤姆擦掉镜子上的水汽开始刮胡子。

en: Let's try not to lose each other in this fog.
zh: 雾这么大，咱们别走散了。

en: Tom and Mary held hands as they watched the fog roll in.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽拉着手，看着大雾弥漫开来。

en: Tom turned on the car's fog lights.
Tom walked away and soon disappeared into the fog.
zh: 汤姆走开了，很快就消失在浓雾中。

en: We could hear a foghorn in the distance.
zh: 我们能听到远处传来的雾号声。

en: I feel like I've already seen this movie.
zh: 我觉得我好像已经看过这部电影了。

en: There's a rumor in my mother's village that we have Japanese ancestors. I don't know what to make of it.
zh: 我妈那个村子里有传言说我们有日本血统，我也不知道该怎么看这事儿。

en: Because of the dense fog, nothing could be seen.
zh: 因为雾太大，啥也看不见。

en: She cried crocodile tears when he left.
zh: 他走的时候，她流下了鳄鱼的眼泪。

en: I like grapes, but I can't eat too many of them.
zh: 我喜欢吃葡萄，但不能吃太多。

en: This might not have anything to do with our problem.
zh: 这可能跟我们的问题没关系。

en: I'm now about as tall as my father.
zh: 我现在快跟我爸一样高了。

en: His normal position is third baseman.
zh: 他的常规位置是三垒手。

en: Do you want to go together?
Put the wet umbrella in this bag, please.
zh: 请把湿雨伞放进这个袋子里。

en: Excuse me, I dropped my chopsticks.
zh: 不好意思，我的筷子掉了。

en: Excuse me, I dropped a chopstick.
zh: 不好意思，我掉了一根筷子。

en: Is there anything you need to do today?
You thought I wouldn't come tonight, didn't you?
zh: 你以为我今晚不来了吧？
